text:
szAppName : apache.exe     szAppVer : 2.2.0.0     szModName : ntdll.dll     
szModVer : 5.1.2600.1221     offset : 000085c0

New to this bug reporting stuff, so please bear with me.

Seems to be when I send large requests to MySql server, mainly on record 
deletion, I get this bug and Apache shutsdown, as I run it as a server, it 
restarts itself. Didn't have this problem on previous versions.

text:

text:
PHP 5, mainly happens with PHPMYADMIN.

Windows XP Pro SP1A.

creator: nick@webthing.com
text:
This is bugzilla for Apache, not PHP, nor PHP applications. 
 
It's also insufficient detail to attempt a diagnosis.  You'll need at least a 
traceback, or an example that reproduces the crash.
